title: Jeb: 移除盔甲效果与盔甲耐久度的关系
author: obby825
txt_content:
本帖最后由 bobby825 于 2015-9-3 21:48 编辑 



Jeb: Rejoice! We've removed armor durability degration because it prevented us from making armor value an attribute. It may return one day tho ;)
Searge: I don't like that change. Bring it back! ;)
Jeb: Because of 140 character limit I need a second tweet: This means armor breaks as in 1.8, so back to "normal".

Jeb: 欢呼！我们移除了盔甲防御值随耐久度的下降因为它阻止我们将盔甲的价值作为一种属性。它可能会在某一天回来 ;)
Searge: 我不喜欢这个改变。改回来！ ;)
Jeb: 因为推特140字的限制我再发一条：这意味着盔甲像1.8一样，它恢复正常了。


应该是说这个：
【Jeb: 盔甲效果将会与盔甲剩余耐久度有关】

replies.author: Neubulaeko
replies.txt_content:
Jeb: Rejoice! We've removed armor durability degration because it prevented us from making armor value an attribute. It may return one day tho ;)

意思是说装备架没有生命么，还是什么……
